```{r libraries, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
library(leaps)
library(MASS)
```

```{r data import & cleaning, include=FALSE}
hd <- read_csv("heart_2020_cleaned.csv")
hd$HeartDisease <- ifelse(hd$HeartDisease == "Yes", 1, 0)
```

```{r full model}
hd_full <- glm(HeartDisease ~ ., family = "binomial", data = hd)
summary(hd_full)
```

```{r stepwise-backward}
step_model <- stepAIC(hd_full, direction = "backward", trace = FALSE)
summary(step_model)
```

```{r stepwise-forward}
step_model <- stepAIC(hd_full, direction = "forward", trace = FALSE)
summary(step_model)
```
